full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Technical Personnel Services
### Solicitation Number: WS4341647805
#### Urgent Notice
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, Procurement Strategy and Contracting (TPSGC/PSPC) is pleased to announce its request for Standing Offer for Technical Personnel Services.

### Request Details
- **Contract Period**: February 1st, 2024 to January 31st, 2026
- **Opening Date and Time**: Invitation to offer will close on January 15th, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.
- **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Service Locations
The services will be required in various buildings located in the region of Quebec, excluding National Capital Region (NCR).

### Technical Personnel Services Requirements
The contractor shall provide technical personnel services from various trade categories including stationary engineer, mechanic welder, electrician, maintenance worker, mechanic labourer, refrigeration technician, and plumber-pipefitter.

### Considerations
- **Trade Agreements**: The Department has reserved the right under the Trade Agreements.
- **CETA and other Trade Agreements**: Contractors participating in this solicitation are required to be aware of the CETA and other trade agreements.

### Important Documents
The listing below indicates that the documents are available for consultation:
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18207658?extsite=MTgyMDc2NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Timelines
All communications and submission must be submitted electronically:

- Deadline: January 15th, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST

### References
To access information about meeting locations, the contact information is below:

- Antoine Englead (elle-la / she-her)
- [englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note to readers:
This announcement contains public record information. The notice URL can be found at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18207658?extsite=MTgyMDc2NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==, for any attachments or additional information.
The estimates and other information were not found suitable to this tender. Please contact the customer services if there are any questions.
